title: Fix offset for URLs containing suffixes
body:
Before:
```
$ spack url parse http://gitlab.cosma.dur.ac.uk/swift/swiftsim/repository/archive.tar.gz?ref=v0.3.0
==> Parsing URL: http://gitlab.cosma.dur.ac.uk/swift/swiftsim/repository/archive.tar.gz?ref=v0.3.0

==> Matched version regex  8: r'\\?ref=(?:.*-|v)*((\\d+\\.)+\\d+).*$'
==> Matched  name   regex  5: r'[^/]+/([^/]+)/repository/archive'

==> Detected:
    http://gitlab.cosma.dur.ac.uk/swift/swiftsim/repository/archive.tar.gz?ref=v0.3.0
          ~~~~~                         --------
    name:    swiftsim
    version: 0.3.0

==> Substituting version 9.9.9b:
    http://gitlab.cosma.dur.ac.uk/swift/swiftsim/repository/archive.tar.gz?ref=v9.9.9b
          ~~~~~                         --------
```
After:
```
$ spack url parse http://gitlab.cosma.dur.ac.uk/swift/swiftsim/repository/archive.tar.gz?ref=v0.3.0
==> Parsing URL: http://gitlab.cosma.dur.ac.uk/swift/swiftsim/repository/archive.tar.gz?ref=v0.3.0

==> Matched version regex  8: r'\\?ref=(?:.*-|v)*((\\d+\\.)+\\d+).*$'
==> Matched  name   regex  5: r'[^/]+/([^/]+)/repository/archive'

==> Detected:
    http://gitlab.cosma.dur.ac.uk/swift/swiftsim/repository/archive.tar.gz?ref=v0.3.0
                                        --------                                ~~~~~
    name:    swiftsim
    version: 0.3.0

==> Substituting version 9.9.9b:
    http://gitlab.cosma.dur.ac.uk/swift/swiftsim/repository/archive.tar.gz?ref=v9.9.9b
                                        --------                                ~~~~~
```
I'll add unit tests for this tomorrow.
